conversation.content: I received a charge for $89.99 on my account. Your sales representative explicitly told me this service would be complimentary.
I understand your concern. Let me pull up your account right away. May I have your account number or the email address associated with your service?
The account email is jackson.miller@techcorp.com. I have the conversation transcript from October 15th if needed.
Thank you. I've located your account, number ACC-45782-JM. I can see the $89.99 charge posted on October 28th for our Premium Support package.
That's exactly the issue. During onboarding, I was promised three months of Premium Support at no charge.
I see the notation here. You're absolutely right. There's a promotional code PSF-OCT-3M that should have been applied to waive the first three months, totaling $269.97 in value.
So this was a billing error on your end. How do we correct this situation?
Absolutely. I'm initiating an immediate refund of $89.99 which will appear in your account within 2-3 business days, confirmation number REF-92847-TK.
I appreciate that. Will the next two months also be automatically waived, or will I face this issue again?
Excellent question. I'm applying the promotional code retroactively now. Your November and December invoices will show $0.00 for Premium Support, with regular billing resuming January 15th, 2025.
Perfect. Can you send me written confirmation of these adjustments to my email address?
Certainly. I'm generating a detailed confirmation now that includes your refund reference REF-92847-TK and the promotional period ending January 14th, 2025.
While we're resolving this, I'd like to understand how this error occurred in the first place.
Of course. The sales team correctly noted the promotion in your account, but the code wasn't properly linked to your billing profile during the system migration we completed October 20th.
I see. What measures are in place to prevent this from happening to other customers?

We've identified 47 affected accounts from that migration and are proactively correcting them. Additionally, we're implementing a dual-verification process for all promotional codes effective November 1st.
That's reassuring. I trust this won't affect my service quality or any other account features?
Not at all. Your Premium Support remains fully active with 24/7 access to our technical team at 1-800-555-8200, and all features continue uninterrupted.
Thank you for the swift resolution. This level of accountability is exactly what I expect from your organization.
I appreciate your professionalism and patience. You'll receive the confirmation email within 15 minutes, and I've added a $25.00 account credit as an apology for the inconvenience.
